metadata.title: CVE-2024-26637 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:ath11k: rely on mac80211 debugfs handling for vif mac80211 started todelete debugfs entries in certain cases, causing a ath11k to crash when ittried to delete the entries later. Fix this by relying on mac80211 todelete the entries when appropriate and adding them from thevif_add_debugfs handler.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
